Class ec.encoding.StopDecoding 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.encoding.StopDecoding
public class StopDecoding
extends Object
implements DecodeResult
A StopDecoding is a DecodeResult that represents an object that is fully functional after Decoder.decode() method is called. See Decoder for more details.

See Also:
Decoder

Construct a StopDecoding for the given instance.
